item.title: OpenWhisk Web Action Errors With Sequences
item.description: This week, I came across an interesting problem when building HTTP APIs on IBM Cloud Functions. How can Apache OpenWhisk Web Actions, implemented using action sequences, handle application errors that need the sequence to stop processing and a custom HTTP response to be returned? This came from wanting to add custom HTTP authentication to existing Web Actions. I had decided to enhance existing Web Actions with authentication using action sequences.
